title: MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries – JumpShip Edition, v1.1.315 + 2 DLCs + Bonus Content
body:
MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries – JumpShip Edition, v1.1.315 + 2 DLCs + Bonus Content


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, Pirate/Privateer, First-person, Third-person, 3D, Mecha
Company: Piranha Games
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI4
Original Size: 21.8 GB
Repack Size: from 12.5 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: ZippyShare
  • Filehoster: BayFiles
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on MechWarrior.5.Mercenaries.JumpShip.Edition-CODEX ISO release: codex-mechwarrior.5.mercenaries.jumpship.edition.iso (23,453,859,840 bytes)
  • Game version is: v1.1.315; 2 DLCs (Heroes of the Inner Sphere & Legend of the Kestrel Lancers) are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading intro videos in 4 languages, credits background video, Xbox tutorial videos and bonus content (3 Soundtracks, Technical Manual and Wallpapers)
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 21.8 to 12.5~14.6 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 7-20 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 47 GB (52 GB during installation)
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

The year is 3015. Humanity has colonized thousands of systems across a vast region of space splintered by centuries of conflict. The battlefields of the future are dominated by MechWarriors, elite pilots of hulking machines of war known as BattleMechs. It is a lucrative time to be a mercenary.

A World of Destruction – Level entire cities and decimate armies of enemy forces while piloting hundreds of unique BattleMech variants.

Seek The Truth – Follow a path of interstellar intrigue in a quest for glory and revenge as the leader of a mercenary company reborn in the flames of near destruction.

The Merc Life – Manage the intricacies of running an expanding mercenary company, from the maintenance and acquisition of BattleMechs to the hiring of fellow MechWarriors.

Fight Together – Fight alongside your friends with four-player PvE co-op support.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is partially backwards compatible with my previous MW5 repack. You can rehash the following files and save up to 3.4 GB of traffic:

  • fg-03.bin
  • fg-optional-credits.bin
  • fg-optional-xbox-videos.bin
  • fg-selective-videos-english.bin
  • fg-selective-videos-french.bin
  • fg-selective-videos-german.bin
  • fg-selective-videos-russian.bin
